channel.title: Girl Problems
channel.description:
Hey, Im in 8th grade (currently dooing freshman/sophmore work :cool:). Theres a girl I kind of know that goes to the same gym as I do. I knew her friend for about 4 years and before she quit, she introduced me to the girl I like. (my sister was friends with her sister =-S). So, I was having problems with talking/introducing my self to her, which I hear is normal. She is about a year posibly two older than me. In the gym we are both busy working out, usualy on different sides of the gym, or different areas, so its not like a school setting where you sit next to her, etc. Any ideas on how to meet up, not sound stupid, get her attention, or what ever? Also, as of this date, we only go the same days once a week and for 30 minutes, (im there from 3:30 - 7:30, shes there from 7:00 - who knows.) :confused:
Please no flaming etc, all help apreciated, so TYVM.

I knew her friend for about 4 years and before she quit, she introduced me to the girl I like. (my sister was friends with her sister =-S). In the gym we are both busy working out, usualy on different sides of the gym, or different areas, so its not like a school setting where you sit next to her, etc. Any ideas on how to meet up, not sound stupid, get her attention, or what ever? Also, as of this date, we only go the same days once a week and for 30 minutes, (im there from 3:30 - 7:30, shes there from 7:00 - who knows.)

Please no flaming etc, all help apreciated, so TYVM.[/quote]

Lol.
I thought your title meant you were a girl with girl problems so i was reading this thinking, am i reading this correct?

item.title: Girl Problems
item.dc:creator: @pimping_one Pimping One
item.description:
@pimping_one wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:175326”][quote author=pimping one link=topic=235721.msg2008637#msg2008637 date=1200988376]
Erm, I suggest Be a man about it (no offense) casually go up and talk to her, It might take everything in your body to do it. Don’t wright some love note saying check yes or no, girls like someone that won’t be scared to put there arm around them, and be sweet, kind, ect… Just casually introduce yourself, after a talk, ask for her number. Then get to know her better for a few weeks. Then in person (most effective) or on the phone (Sometimes works) ask her out. and the worst thing she can say is no.
[/quote]
you sure talk confident for a 12 year old[/quote]
Rofl, Dude im 14, No life much?

Read full topic
